channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Softbank CEO Wants to Build ‘Trump Industrial Parks’ on Federal Land to Boost AI: Report
item.description: The idea sounds similar to Trump's "freedom cities" first pitched in 2023.

item.title: Europol takes down crypto and laundering network worth 700 million
item.description: A two-stage campaign resulted in the arrest of nine and the seizure of cash, crypto, and other valuables.

item.title: Horses is a hit, but its studio might still be in trouble
item.description: After indie narrative horror game Horses was banned from Steam two years ago, it put the studio, Santa Ragione, at risk of closure. Studio cofounder and Horses producer Pietro Righi Riva had to make a difficult phone call to the game’s director, Italian filmmaker Andrea Lucco Borlera. “I was terrified for him,” Riva said in […]

item.title: Ancient Bird Swallowed 800 Rocks and Choked to Death, Scientists Say
item.description: “When birds are sick, they start doing weird things.”

item.title: Chrome can now autofill details from your Google account
item.description: Google has announced several autofill improvements being rolled out to the mobile and desktop versions of Chrome. The updates will give autofill access to more of your data from places like Google Wallet and make it easier to select the right info a form is asking for when there are multiple suggestions. Autofill can now […]

item.title: The Best Deals From the Silk & Snow Cyber Week Sale (2025)
item.description: For a few more days, you can save on mattresses and bed frames from one of our favorite makers.

item.title: Stock market nears an all-time high
item.description: Renewed hopes for a cut to interest rates by the Fed at its meeting next week helped stocks recover some losses. The U.S. stock market is flirting with its all-time high on Friday.

item.title: You can now use Pixel phones as a Switch 2 webcam
item.description: When it launched the Switch 2’s compatibility with various webcams was hit or miss. A webcam isn’t a necessary accessory, but since the Switch 2 lacks one of its own, you need one to take full advantage of the console’s GameChat feature that can livestream players’ faces during multiplayer matches. Switch 2 webcam compatibility has […]

item.title: New Android malware threat can wipe your bank account
item.description: There's a new malicious way for bad actors to get access to your bank account using Android.

item.title: The Luigi Mangione trial is all about narrative control
item.description: On Monday, several dozen members of the public are lined up outside 100 Centre Street in Lower Manhattan, hoping to squeeze into the courtroom to hear testimony from witnesses called by the state against Luigi Mangione - the man accused of shooting and killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson a year ago. Despite the endless news […]

item.title: Sous pression de Google et de Gemini 3, OpenAI lancerait une grosse mise à jour pour ChatGPT très vite
item.description: Sam Altman, le patron d'OpenAI, a secoué ses troupes il y a quelques jours en activant un « code rouge ». Première conséquence concrète : GPT-5.2 pourrait être lancé très prochainement, dès la semaine prochaine en fait, pour mieux concurrencer Gemini 3.

item.title: Experts warn this 'worst case scenario' React vulnerability could soon be exploited - so patch now
item.description: React patches a 10/10 flaw that can be used for remote code execution.

item.title: BTC price: Bitcoin is seeing a trend that hasn’t happened since 2014. Here’s why crypto markets are so unusual right now
item.description: The stock market is experiencing record gains in 2025, but the crypto market has struggled—marking a relatively rare phenomenon for investors. It is a relatively rare phenomenon: While the stock market continues to experience record gains (the S&P 500 is up over 16% this year), Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies continue to struggle, making it the first time the crypto and stock markets have split since 2014, Bloomberg reported....

item.title: AWS re:Invent was an all-in pitch for AI. Customers might not be ready.
item.description: AWS is releasing a lot of new AI tech, but the cloud infrastructure giant's enterprise customers may not be ready for it yet.

item.title: Sci-Fi Is Already Making a Good Showing This Awards Season
item.description: 'Bugonia,' 'Frankenstein,' 'Sinners', and 'Wicked For Good' are already racking up the nominations.

item.title: I can't believe these Black Friday Apple deals are still live – AirPods, Apple Watch, MacBooks, and more
item.description: You can still score record-low Black Friday prices on Apple devices, and I'm rounding up the 11 best, including AirPods, iPads, the Apple Watch, MacBooks, and more.

item.title: Elon Musk Slapped With $140 Million Fine Over Deceptive Blue Checks on X
item.description: The fine would put a big dent in one Musk's only revenue-generating moves after taking over Twitter.

item.title: 9 Best Lubes (2025): Water-Based, Silicone, Natural Oils
item.description: For the most sensitive parts of the human body, friction is the enemy. Here’s how to keep it at bay with our favorite lubes made of water, silicone, or natural oil.

item.title: EU launches antitrust investigation into Meta’s WhatsApp AI access policy
item.description: Europe (and Italy) is worried about WhatsApp’s AI policy and its effects on competition.

item.title: PS5 Pro : vos jeux seraient encore plus beaux en 2026 grâce à cet « énorme » coup de pouce logiciel
item.description: Sony préparerait une mise à jour majeure de sa technologie d'upscaling par IA, le PSSR, pour la PS5 Pro en 2026. Selon la chaîne YouTube Moore’s Law is Dead, cette nouvelle version, nommée PSSR 2, promet d'améliorer le visuel de nos jeux, mais aussi d'alléger les ressources nécessaires à leur exécution.

item.title: This Alienware Aurora desktop packs incredible speed and power with the cheapest RTX 5080 anywhere - and it has $730 off right now
item.description: The Alienware Aurora Desktop PC is an unbelievable bargain right now, with a huge $730 saving.

item.title: Treasury fines N.Y. property management firm $7.1 million over ties to Putin’s ally
item.description: Gracetown Inc. had received 24 payments between April 2018 and May 2020 totaling $31,250 on behalf of a company owned by the Russian oligarch. The U.S. Treasury Department imposed a $7.1 million fine on a New York-based property management firm Thursday, accusing it of violating sanctions by managing luxury real estate properties for oligarch Oleg Deripaska, who has close ties to Russian President Vladimir Putin....

item.title: We found the only PS5 console bundles still at Black Friday prices
item.description: As of Dec. 5, get these PS5 console bundles on sale for their Black Friday prices.

item.title: New research reveals older users less likely to find AI useful
item.description: Cisco says we need to focus on giving everyone AI skills and opportunities, not just rolling it out quickly.

item.title: Trump replaces head architect after clashing over ‘big, beautiful’ White House ballroom
item.description: Shalom Baranes will take over the ballroom construction after the Trump administration parted ways with the original architect. It’s been less than two months since President Trump began his demolition of the White House’s East Wing to make room for his “big, beautiful White House Ballroom,” and the President is already parting ways with the original architect behind the project....

item.title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
item.description: As a technology, eSIM has been around for a decade now. However, global eSIM adoption was around 3% last year and will only cross 5% this year. Despite these figures, analysts, eSIM-providing startups, and investors are bullish about eSIM's upward trajectory, largely thanks to travel.

item.title: New ‘KnoWay’ robotaxis cause chaos in upcoming Grand Theft Auto Online DLC
item.description: The inclusion of the Waymo look-a-likes appears to be part of a larger storyline that will encourage players to "stop the development of a mass surveillance network."

item.title: État d’urgence chez ChatGPT : sortie imminente de la version GPT 5.2 pour répondre à Google
item.description: En panique, OpenAI s'apprêterait dès la semaine prochaine à lancer GPT 5.2 pour répondre à Gemini 3.

item.title: Mi-moniteur, mi-Smart TV, cet écran PC LG ultra-wide (21:9) de 34 pouces animé par webOS chute sous les 300 €
item.description: Avec sa dalle ultra-large et son système webOS, l'écran PC LG Smart Monitor 34U601SA-W peut aussi bien être utilisé pour travailler que pour les moments de détente. Actuellement, Amazon le propose à 299,95 euros au lieu de 379,99 euros.
